content.text: Hey, I'm having a rough time and I'm not sure what to do. Can we talk?
I'm having a hard time dealing with my emotions. I feel like I'm always on edge and I can't relax.
That sounds tough. What's been making you feel this way?
I think it's a lot of things. I'm not sure where to start.
Well, let's start with the most recent thing. What's been happening lately that's been causing you stress?
Well, my dad owns an appliance store and he wants me to take over when he retires.
Oh, that's a lot of pressure. Does that mean you have to work there?
No, but he's been pressuring me to do it and I don't want to disappoint him.
I can understand why that would be stressful. It sounds like you're feeling like you have to make a decision that you're not sure about.
Exactly. I don't know what to do. I don't want to disappoint my dad, but I also don't want to do something that I don't want to do.
It sounds like you're in a tough spot. I'm not sure what the best answer is, but I can listen if you want to talk more about it.
Thanks. I appreciate that. I'm not sure what I'm going to do, but I feel better just talking about it.
I'm glad I could help. Just remember that you're not alone and there are people who can help you if you need it.
Thanks. I'll keep that in mind.
